infoText: This is a one-time notice so that you are aware of the new map download & install feature on the main menu.  This was done to make it even easier for you to get the default map and extended content to use when you want.

There is an update to the Main map as well as the extended content, this fixes all of the currently known issues with the CustomNPC quests and errors found in the map and affects the main map as well as the extended content.
I am thankful that you have decided to play this pack and please let me know if you have any questions or issues while playing!
